thread.title: Sandra Bullock & Rihanna Look Ready for a Heist on 'Ocean's Eight' Set!
thread.title_full: Sandra Bullock & Rihanna Look Ready for a Heist on 'Ocean's Eight' Set!

author: Just Jared
title: Sandra Bullock & Rihanna Look Ready for a Heist on 'Ocean's Eight' Set!
text:
Sarah Paulson , Rihanna , Awkwafina , and Sandra Bullock look like they’re ready to pull of a heist while filming a scene for their movie Ocean’s Eight on Tuesday (January 24) in New York City.
The ladies were dressed in all black while getting out of a large van together!
PHOTOS: Check out the latest pics of Rihanna 
The plot of the movie is not yet known, but we do know that there is going to be a scene at the annual Met Gala and tons of celebs like Kim Kardashian , Kendall Jenner , Katie Holmes , and more have filmed cameos!
15+ pictures inside of the Ocean’s Eight ladies on set…
